title: Council Decision of 27 March 1995 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 27 March 1995 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners (95/C 83/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 78/688/EEC of 25 July 1978 setting up an Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 25 July 1994 (2), the Council appointed Mr Steen HARTVIG HANSEN an alternate member for the period ending 24 July 1997;
Whereas the Danish Government has nominated Mr Peter ALBAEK to replace Mr Steen HARTVIG HANSEN,
main_body: Mr Peter ALBAEK is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Dental Practitioners in place of Mr Steen HARTVIG HANSEN for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1995.
For the Council
The President
M. GIRAUD
(1) OJ No L 233, 24. 8. 1978, p. 15.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 5.
